NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION AND RADIO PLACEMENT SERVICE
Mr. H. B. Powell
Publications Director
W. K. Kellogg Foundation
250 Champion Street
Battle Creek, Michigan
Dear Mr. Powell:
14 GREGORY HALL
JRBANA, ILLINOIS
August 19, 1958
AUG 2 0 1358
Enclosed is the artist’s rough sketch designed for the NAEB portion of your
annual report. In explanation of the layout: it was planned for a page sim¬
ilar to one from your 1953-1954 report, as far as page size, margins, and
two-tone color. (As I mentioned in my letter yesterday, the colored portion
may be a gray tone if this would best answer yoir needs.)
In considering caption-labels for the sketches, may I suggest the following:
NAEB RADIO. . .
satisfies the individual taste
enriches the school curriculum
contributes to the child’s intellectual growth
enlightens and entertains the family
stimulates adult discussion groups
(The last two are in reverse order.) Please advise us on your printing require¬
ments, whether we should have the captions set here and submitted with the
layout, or whether you will include the captions after we send you the final
artwork. Please feel free, too, to us£ your own ideas for captions, if_ you
do want to use them.
We would like to make one suggestion to the artist before he reworks this in
final form, and that is to include more people in the sketch of the adult group
of listeners. If you have further suggestions on the sketches or on the order
in which they appear, please let us know.
With this information (on layout size and color, printing requirements for any
captions, and suggestions on the final form) I believe we will be able to pro¬
ceed without further difficulty.
Thank you for your help.
Sincerely,
Jane Lombard
Editor
